title: Ticket #4576: JobRouter requires GridResource to be set
description: The JobRouter requires a GridResource attribute to be set for all routes (probably due to its origins as a mechanism for sending jobs out to the grid). There is little use for this in the context of the HTCondor-CE -- we should simply remove this requirement.
remarks:
2014-Sep-17 13:45:18 by blin:
This actually doesn't get triggered unless the universe is set to grid universe, which seems to be a reasonable requirement.

2014-Sep-17 13:55:11 by bbockelm:
Yup - reviewing code, I agree. I think my testing was just bad awhile ago when I found this.

BrianL - thanks for closing this ticket, can you open a pull request to remove the unnecessary line in the condor-ce config?
